title: mStableDAO allocation of $1m MTA to Bancor
body:
### Summary:

As summarised in this [forum post](https://forum.mstable.org/t/discussion-initial-mta-liquidity-seeding-on-bancor/452) here, it is proposed that the mStableDAO provide c.1m USD worth of MTA tokens to boost liquidity in the MTA/BNT pool on Bancor.

This assumes a positive resolution to the proposal on the Bancor forum post [here](https://gov.bancor.network/t/proposal-increase-co-investment-limit-to-1m-bnt-on-mta-pool/1796) to increase the co-investment limit to 1m BNT in the MTA pool there. This proposal is scheduled to go to a snapshot on Bancor's page on Monday 19, April 2021 at 12:00 pm UTC.

The MTA/BNT pool can be seen [here](https://app.bancor.network/eth/portfolio/stake/add/single/0x3035529E7aE11A3660134c9C875F4faa6514d042).

**Should the mStableDAO contribute $1,000,000 worth of MTA liquidity to the MTA/BNT pair on Bancor?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
